DOC.brief_summary: This study three part study ass safety efficacy LEZ763 normal healthy volunteer patient Type 2 Diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics LEZ763
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : All subject : ( suggest reduce duplication ) Male female age 1865 yr , Subjects must weigh least 50 kg participate study . Body mass index ( BMI ) must within range 1837 kg/m2 ( inclusive Only postmenopausal female female subject report surgical sterilization ( woman without child bear potential ) allow study . Subjects stable conventional sleepwake cycle Normal Healthy Volunteers Healthy male female subject , must good health ( determine past medical history , physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiogram , laboratory test Screening ) . Type II Diabetic Patients Type 2 diabetes diagnosed American Diabetes Association criteria least 3 month prior screen . Patients either drug naïve stable dose metformin ( stable dose least 4 week prior Screening ) . The metformin dose remain constant course study . HbA1c 6.5 9.5 % inclusive screening Exclusion criterion : All subject : Smokers ( use tobacco product previous 3 month ) . Donation loss 400 mL blood within 8 week prior first dose , longer required local regulation . Significant illness within two week prior dose . Have ( history ) drug alcohol abuse within 12 month prior dose evidence abuse indicate laboratory assay conduct screen baseline evaluation Normal Healthy Volunteers • History diabetes , adrenal disorder . Type II Diabetic Patients Type 1 diabetes mellitus ; positive antiGAD antibody ; acquire secondary form diabetes result pancreatic surgery/injury , cystic fibrosis relate diabetes Evidence clinically significant diabetic complication ( nephropathy , retinopathy , neuropathy ) Other protocol define inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
